moves.1. e4: Hi! Today I'm showing you my first team game win for quite a while. Anyway, my opponent starts with the most common opening move.
moves.2. Nf3 Nc6: Usually what happens in my games nowadays.
moves.3. c3: What is this move meant to do?
moves.5... Nf6 6. a3: Why did my opponent do that, I wonder?
moves.9... Qd7: I think I moved this to castle.
moves.11. b5 axb5: My queenside is now pretty weak.
moves.14. g5: Maybe I should have done h6 to prepare.
moves.15. Qxf7 Nc5: Can't remember why I did this.
moves.16. Qe6+: ?? My poor opponent is now in huge trouble. But chess is not a game of mercy, so dead queen.
moves.23... Qxa3 24. Kd2: Why is the white king running around?
moves.28. Kg3: Kh5 would have been mate in two.
moves.29. Kg2: I'm probably missing a forced mate.
moves.34. Kh5: One of two possible moves, but either would have meant mate in one.
